channel.title: Help with quests
channel.description:
Can anyone tell me how to make it so everyone has the quests finished...
and for some reason i cant find anywhere in my files for the start point.. [delta]

item.title: Help with quests
item.dc:creator: @Elven_Dremor Elven Dremor
item.description:
@Elven_Dremor wrote:

Open client.java

Search for if(starter == 0){

Add this before your ending bracket:

q1 = 15; q2 = 15; q3= 15; q4 = 15; q5 = 15; q6 = 15; q7 = 15; q8 = 15; q9 = 15; q10 = 15; q11 = 15;

Read full topic

item.title: Help with quests
item.dc:creator: @x_pk3r_xx x pk3r xx
item.description:
@x_pk3r_xx wrote:

ehm, i’m not good with delta, but i think you just have to look for one of the quest names in the client.java and change the @red@'s to @gre@ ?

or if you need the player to have completed the quest and not just look like he did. i think you would have to add something in player.java wich sets all questdone or whatever void your using to true instead of false when they first log in.

I’m just geussing, you can at least try.

Read full topic
